SEARCH

Class Book

java.lang.Object
Publication
Book
public class Book extends Publication
A Book class that contains information specific for books, able to hold the genre and number of pages of a publication, in addition to the data held by the parent class Publication
Version:
0.1
Author:
Eduardo Olalde
